| HistoryText             = 
The members of the team known as [[Mutant Force (Earth-616)|Mutant Force]] reorganized as the Resistants to protest the Mutant Registration Act and fight for mutant rights. 

The Resistants were unknowingly funded by the [[Johann Shmidt (Earth-616)|Red Skull]] as one of his many schemes to destablize america. During this period, a number of new members were added and the older members adopted new aliases. The team were drawn into a trap by the then Captain America, [[Jonathan Walker (Earth-616)|John Walker]], his partner [[Lemar Hoskins (Earth-616)|Battlestar]] and the government mutant super team [[Freedom Force (Earth-616)|Freedom Force]]. Walker took down the team with extreme violence. 

The team apparently disbanded and the Mutant Force members went back to their original identities.{{r|New Warriors Vol 2 6}}
